body: Both Go 1.4 and 1.5 have a default timeout of 10 minutes.  However, I don't how that could be the issue here.  You seem to be suggesting that your tests complete quickly with Go 1.4 but sometimes hang with Go 1.5.  Look at http://tip.golang.org/doc/go1.5#runtime .  Is it possible that your tests or code are depending on a specific goroutine scheduling order?
